Class TargetingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.targeting.TargetingClient

  • public class TargetingClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client to manage updating the endpoint profile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TargetingClient(com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.core.PinpointContext context)

      TargetingClient(com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.core.PinpointContext context, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
      Initializes a targetingClient used for testing only

    • Method Detail

      • currentEndpoint

        public EndpointProfile currentEndpoint()
        Returns the device endpoint profile. TargetingClient attributes and Metrics are added to the endpoint profile.
        Returns:
        The current device endpoint profile

      • updateEndpointProfile

        public void updateEndpointProfile()
        Register the current endpoint with the Pinpoint service. TargetingClient attributes and Metrics are added to the endpoint profile.

      • updateEndpointProfile

        public void updateEndpointProfile(EndpointProfile endpointProfile)
        Register the provided endpoint with the Pinpoint service. TargetingClient attributes and Metrics are added to the endpoint profile.
        Parameters:
        endpointProfile - An instance of an EndpointProfile to be updated

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributeValues)
        Adds the specified attribute to the current endpoint profile generated by this client. Note: The maximum allowed attributes/metrics is 20. Attempts to add more may be ignored
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to add
        attributeValues - the value of the attribute

      • removeAttribute

        public void removeAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName)
        Removes the specified attribute. All subsequently created events will no longer have this global attribute. from the current endpoint profile generated by this client.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to remove

      • addMetric

        public void addMetric(java.lang.String metricName,
                      java.lang.Double metricValue)
        Adds the specified metric to the current endpoint profile generated by this client. Note: The maximum allowed attributes and metrics on an endpoint update is 20. Attempts to add more may be ignored
        Parameters:
        metricName - the name of the metric to add
        metricValue - the value of the metric

      • removeMetric

        public void removeMetric(java.lang.String metricName)
        Removes the specified metric from the current endpoint profile generated by this client.
        Parameters:
        metricName - the name of the metric to remove
